Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.renderer

Class Animation

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.renderer.Animation
Direct Known Subclasses:
MoveAnimation
public abstract class Animation extends Object
Abstract superclass for all Animations.
